products.title: Hive Plain Black Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive plain black perfect fit pleated blind px71004. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hiveplainblack perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Gloss Black Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. The intense hue of gloss black offers
products.productdescription: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. The intense hue of gloss black offers a simmering energy to interiors, creating a dramatic backdrop when shuttered  struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required all of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more.

products.title: Hive Blackout Black Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive blackout black perfect fit pleated blind px72004. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive blackout black perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric.  Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Black Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This black perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Cosmos Black PerfectFIT Venetian Blind

products.title: Cosmos Black PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: This unique venetian blind has sparkling slats that change colour with every turn. The dark shade will give your room an elegant look and match easily with any kind of furniture you choose.
products.productdescription: This unique venetian blind has sparkling slats that change colour with every turn. The dark shade will give your room an elegant look and match easily with any kind of furniture you choose.

products.title: Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Like all the kingston blinds, kingston black pleated perfect fit benefits from a pebble-dash effect across the fabric body that creates an organic texture. The dark black fabric is softened by this dappling texture, while the dimout style further enhances this effect by allowing gentle light levels to flow through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in flush against the window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required
